6FO.F.summary: Goodtech ASA operates as an automation, power, and industrial engineering company in Norway, Sweden, Finland, Europe, and internationally. It designs and supplies turnkey systems to convert and modernize existing systems, such as operator, process safety, industrial IT, and control systems; and provides service and support in electrical, mechanical, automation, and industrial IT sectors. The company also delivers proprietary technologies and customized solutions, including packaging machines, bulk handling systems, and logistic and machining solutions, as well as provides engineering and aftermarket services. In addition, it supplies power systems for power, oil and gas, and renewable energy industries; and constructs and operates electrical systems. Further, the company provides products and solutions, such as water purification, waste water treatment, industrial water, energy recovery technology, and biogas systems. It serves a range of customers within process and manufacturing, aquaculture, oil and gas, power, and water treatment industries. Goodtech ASA was founded in 1913 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

VEI.OL.summary: Veidekke ASA operates as a construction and property development company in Norway, Sweden, and Denmark. The company operates through Construction and Industrial segments. It undertakes various building construction, refurbishment, and civil engineering contracts; develops sites; and constructs non-residential and residential buildings. The company constructs office buildings, shopping centers, hotels, schools, health care buildings, cultural buildings, roads, railways, power plants, and industrial facilities. It also develops residential projects; operates and maintains public roads; and produces and sells asphalt and aggregates. The company was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.
